contentrichtext.text: '''Galt''' or '''GALT''' may refer to: {{TOCright}} ==Biology and biochemistry== *[[Galactose-1-phosphate uridylyltransferase]], an enzyme *[[Gut-associated lymphoid tissue]] ==People== *Sir [[Alexander Tilloch Galt]], a major figure in Canadian Confederation *[[James Galt]], Scottish footballer *[[Galt MacDermot]], musician *[[John Galt (novelist)]], Scottish writer ;Fictional *[[John Galt]], the hero character from Ayn Rand's novel ''Atlas Shrugged'' ==Places== ;In Canada *Galt, Ontario (now part of [[Cambridge, Ontario]]) ;In Mongolia *[[Galt, Khövsgöl]] ;In the United States *[[Galt, California]] *[[Galt, Illinois]] *[[Galt, Iowa]] *[[Galt, Michigan]] *[[Galt, Missouri]] ==Other== *[[HMCS Galt (K163)|HMCS ''Galt'']] (K163), ship of the Canadian navy *[[Galt Aureus]], an American rock band *[[Galt Toys]], a British toy and game manufacturer. ==See also== *[[Gault (disambiguation)]] {{disambig}} [[Category:Place name disambiguation pages]]
